          <title>
            <string language="no">Hårføner</string>
            <string language="en">Hair dryer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Haartrockner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sèche-cheveux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Secador de cabelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στεγνωτήρας τρίχας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Secador de pelo</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hva er energi- og strømforbruket til en hårføner ved forskjellig styrke?</string>
            <string language="en">What is the energy-and the electricity comsumption of a hair dryer at the different speeds?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">effekt</string>
            <string language="en">effect</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">energiforbruk</string>
            <string language="en">energy consumption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">strømforbruk</string>
            <string language="en">electricity comsumption</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Was ist das Energie-und Elektrizität comsumption
eines Haartrockners mit den unterschiedlichen Geschwindigkeiten?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel est l'énergie-et comsumption de 
l'électricité d'un sèche-cheveux aux différentes vitesses ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que é o energia-e comsumption da eletricidade de
um secador de cabelo nas velocidades diferentes?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Che cosa è energia-e comsumption di elettricità
di un fon alle velocità differenti?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιο είναι το ενέργεια-και comsumption ηλεκτρικής 
ενέργειας ενός στεγνωτήρα τρίχας με τις διαφορετικές ταχύτητες;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Cuál es el energi'a-y comsumption de la 
electricidad de un secador de pelo a las diversas velocidades?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energieverbrauch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
